MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G52 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:30PM to safely carry out repair work on our underground cable network at Mosspark Oval and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:05 PM on Monday, 30 November 2020
